title: Option to only view certain boards
body:
I'd like the option to "uncheck" boards that I'm uninterested in. Right now, Fantasy LCS is clogging everything up and I have absolutely no interest in it. I want to see every board except that (and maybe Story & Art).

Does it seem like a difficult thing to put checkboxes to the left of each Board on the list, and we can just uncheck the ones we don't want to see (as opposed to either seeing all posts, or just posts from a single board)?

replies.body:
Hey Valk, we'll eventually be rolling out 'subscriptions' that will allow you to better cater the Boards to your preferences. No current ETA on when that will roll out but it is something we're working towards. Appreciate the feedback!
{{champion:96}}

> [{quoted}](name=Valkyrie Witch,realm=NA,application-id=bzRrPGQO,discussion-id=Gfbqb2v4,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2015-05-19T14:24:13.132+0000)
>
> Sweets, update?

Hey Valk, as far as I know the Boards team is still working towards this!

Will subscriptions still show the ones you don't want to see, though? I know with other boards, "Subscriptions" is more just, you receive notifications when a thread you choose has updates.
I think OP's question is more of totally removing view of forums you don't want to see anymore.
freakin 4 months latter.... memes and games.... are flooding the freaking feeds still.....

not at all  
i would just like control of what i see, when i see it so when im in a meme mood i can do that, and when im in a gameplay mood i can see that
This has been an idea that has been taken positively both in the community and with the Boards team. While I can't say where they are on the list, this *is* high on it I assure you.
Appreciate the feedback. I hate posting things that have already been said, I haven't seen it before and I don't frequent Reddit where many ideas are thoroughly discussed.
Oh it hasn't really been brought up on Boards recently so don't take this as me saying "re-post" I just wanted to keep you informed. No matter what it's a good idea that I support.
